text: The Naked Truth is an American television series that aired on ABC from September 13, 1995, to February 28, 1996, and on NBC from January 16, 1997, to May 25, 1998. The series stars TÃ©a Leoni and Holland Taylor. The show took place at the office of a tabloid news publication. ==Cast== * Tea Leoni as Nora Wilde * Darryl Sivad as T.J. * Holland Taylor as Camilia Dane * Mark Roberts as Dave * Jack Blessing as Mr. Donner * Amy Ryan as Chloe Banks == Other websites == * Category:1995 American television series debuts Category:1998 television series endings Category:1990s American television series Category:Television series set in San Francisco Category:1990s American sitcoms Category:English-language television programs Category:ABC network series Category:NBC network series
title: The Naked Truth (TV series)
